mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ART_ID, A.BRD_ID, A.ART_TITLE, A.ART_REGDATE, A.TRD_ID, A.ART_GOOD, A.ART_BAD, A.ART_READ, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_IMAGE FROM ARTICLE A JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEM_ID) WHERE TRUNC(BRD_ID / 100) * 100 = #{boardNum} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 AND ART_ISNOTICE = 0 ORDER BY ART_REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ART_ID, A.BRD_ID, A.ART_TITLE, A.ART_REGDATE, A.TRD_ID, A.ART_GOOD, A.ART_BAD, A.ART_READ, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_IMAGE FROM ARTICLE A JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEM_ID) WHERE TRUNC(BRD_ID / 100) * 100 = #{boardNum} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 AND ART_ISNOTICE = 0 AND ART_REGDATE > SYSDATE - 7 ORDER BY A.ART_GOOD DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HISTORY WHERE TRD_ID IN (SELECT TRD_ID FROM TRADE WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND HIS_SCORE = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HISTORY WHERE TRD_ID IN (SELECT TRD_ID FROM TRADE WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND HIS_SCORE = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HISTORY WHERE TRD_ID IN (SELECT TRD_ID FROM TRADE WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND HIS_SCORE = -1
SELECT TRD_ENDDATE FROM TRADE WHERE TRD_ID = #{trd_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE ART_ID = #{art_id} AND BRD_ID = #{brd_id}

SELECT A.ART_ID, A.BRD_ID, A.MEM_ID, A.ART_TITLE, A.ART_CONTENT, A.ART_REGDATE, A.TRD_ID, A.ART_GOOD, A.ART_BAD, A.ART_READ, A.ART_TAG1, A.ART_TAG2, A.ART_TAG3, A.ART_TAG4, A.ART_TAG5, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_IMAGE, M.MEM_GENDER, M.MEM_LATEST, NVL(H.HIS_GOOD, 0), NVL(H.HIS_NORMAL, 0), NVL(H.HIS_BAD, 0), T.TRD_ENDDATE, NVL(R.REP_COUNT, 0) REP_COUNT FROM ARTICLE A LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADE T ON (A.TRD_ID = T.TRD_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TRD_ID, COUNT(CASE WHEN HISTORY.HIS_SCORE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) HIS_GOOD, COUNT(CASE WHEN HISTORY.HIS_SCORE = 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) HIS_NORMAL, COUNT(CASE WHEN HISTORY.HIS_SCORE = -1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) HIS_BAD FROM HISTORY GROUP BY TRD_ID) H ON (A.TRD_ID = H.TRD_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ART_ID, BRD_ID, COUNT(*) REP_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY ART_ID, BRD_ID) R ON (A.ART_ID = R.ART_ID AND A.BRD_ID = R.BRD_ID) WHERE A.ART_ID = #{art_id} AND A.BRD_ID = #{brd_id} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.ART_ISNOTICE = 0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ART_ID, A.BRD_ID, A.ART_TITLE, A.ART_REGDATE, A.TRD_ID, A.ART_GOOD, A.ART_BAD, A.ART_READ, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_IMAGE, M.MEM_GENDER, M.MEM_LATEST, NVL(H.HIS_GOOD, 0) HIS_GOOD, NVL(H.HIS_NORMAL, 0) HIS_NORMAL, NVL(H.HIS_BAD, 0) HIS_BAD, T.TRD_ENDDATE, NVL(R.REP_COUNT, 0) REP_COUNT FROM ARTICLE A LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADE T ON (A.TRD_ID = T.TRD_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TRD_ID, COUNT(CASE WHEN HISTORY.HIS_SCORE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) HIS_GOOD, COUNT(CASE WHEN HISTORY.HIS_SCORE = 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) HIS_NORMAL, COUNT(CASE WHEN HISTORY.HIS_SCORE = -1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) HIS_BAD FROM HISTORY GROUP BY TRD_ID) H ON (A.TRD_ID = H.TRD_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ART_ID, BRD_ID, COUNT(*) REP_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY ART_ID, BRD_ID) R ON (A.ART_ID = R.ART_ID AND A.BRD_ID = R.BRD_ID) WHERE TRUNC(A.BRD_ID / 100) * 100 = #{boardNum} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.ART_ISNOTICE = 0 ORDER BY ART_REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ART_ID, A.BRD_ID, A.ART_TITLE, A.ART_REGDATE, A.TRD_ID, A.ART_GOOD, A.ART_BAD, A.ART_READ, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_IMAGE, M.MEM_GENDER, M.MEM_LATEST, NVL(H.HIS_GOOD, 0) HIS_GOOD, NVL(H.HIS_NORMAL, 0) HIS_NORMAL, NVL(H.HIS_BAD, 0) HIS_BAD, T.TRD_ENDDATE, NVL(R.REP_COUNT, 0) REP_COUNT FROM ARTICLE A LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADE T ON (A.TRD_ID = T.TRD_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TRD_ID, COUNT(CASE WHEN HISTORY.HIS_SCORE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) HIS_GOOD, COUNT(CASE WHEN HISTORY.HIS_SCORE = 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) HIS_NORMAL, COUNT(CASE WHEN HISTORY.HIS_SCORE = -1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) HIS_BAD FROM HISTORY GROUP BY TRD_ID) H ON (A.TRD_ID = H.TRD_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ART_ID, BRD_ID, COUNT(*) REP_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY ART_ID, BRD_ID) R ON (A.ART_ID = R.ART_ID AND A.BRD_ID = R.BRD_ID) WHERE TRUNC(A.BRD_ID / 100) * 100 = #{boardNum} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.ART_ISNOTICE = 0 AND ART_REGDATE > SYSDATE - 7 ORDER BY A.ART_GOOD DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, C.COMM_VALUE BRD_NAME, T.TRD_ENDDATE, NVL(R.REP_COUNT, 0) REP_COUNT FROM ARTICLE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMM C ON (A.BRD_ID = C.COMM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADE T ON (A.TRD_ID = T.TRD_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ART_ID, BRD_ID, COUNT(*) REP_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY ART_ID, BRD_ID) R ON (A.ART_ID = R.ART_ID AND A.BRD_ID = R.BRD_ID) WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 ORDER BY A.ART_REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
